5) µvoyen examine *exagmen, ex- + agō + -men ⇔ augmen

𓅜 ר֣וּחַ ruakh рух روح ruach רוּחָא rūḥā Rauch / Geist / spirit 𓅜 𓏏 𓆘 uraeus-serpent
